Job Title: Senior Software/ Lead Engineer - Python/ SDN Development

Participate in discussions with different groups within the project group based in various locations to create/design technical solutions  ....
UG: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Computers
Doctorate: Any Doctorate in Any Specialization, Doctorate Not Required
